imdb.plot outline: The participants will be kept in a lodge in the middle of the forest during the whole shooting of the show. It will be a camp where their physical and mental abilities will be tested. They will not get access to their relatives or any outsider and will be allowed to use the phone only 10 mins per day - They will be followed by the members of the jury on different aspects as their diet, their behavior and discipline . They will be followed by professionals in each respective field as fitness, diet, etc - Everything will be recorded and during the broadcast on MBC1, we will show clips of all what they went through during the week. As the experience is going to be a tough one, each candidate will be able to express their emotion in front of the camera, to add up to the dramatic part of the reality show. They will be given points by a panel of professional esteemed judges according to their performance. They will also be judged for their performance, discipline and mental / physical power while they are put into real situations. Each week 1 candidate will leave the show after the deliberation of the jury. PERFECT PLAYER will be the first adventurous Mauritian reality TV show with plenty of stunts, extreme sports, challenges, suspense and emotion.
imdb.title: Perfect Player The Real Game Mauritius
akas: Perfect Player The Real Game Mauritius (Mauritius)
plot: PERFECT PLAYER The Real Game 2014,Mauritius - either catch up or pack up!!.::Nalini

The participants will be kept in a lodge in the middle of the forest during the whole shooting of the show. It will be a camp where their physical and mental abilities will be tested. They will not get access to their relatives or any outsider and will be allowed to use the phone only 10 mins per day - They will be followed by the members of the jury on different aspects as their diet, their behavior and discipline . They will be followed by professionals in each respective field as fitness, diet, etc - Everything will be recorded and during the broadcast on MBC1, we will show clips of all what they went through during the week. As the experience is going to be a tough one, each candidate will be able to express their emotion in front of the camera, to add up to the dramatic part of the reality show. They will be given points by a panel of professional esteemed judges according to their performance. They will also be judged for their performance, discipline and mental / physical power while they are put into real situations. Each week 1 candidate will leave the show after the deliberation of the jury. PERFECT PLAYER will be the first adventurous Mauritian reality TV show with plenty of stunts, extreme sports, challenges, suspense and emotion.::MBC1
